name: Incursion: Right of Conquest - Alpha
description:
This is a 1st/3rd person multiplayer team shooter for windows. Select one of up to 8 unique teams, each with their own characters, with different weapons, roles, strengths and weaknesses.

Play this game with your friends cooperatively vs bots, competitively with bots filling in the gaps, go 1v1 with them turned off or fight the computer by yourself. Capture objectives, play for kills or just explore and have fun, the choice is yours.

If you have friends you want to play with but other multiplayer games feel too daunting for them, this might be the game for you. Multiplayer is clunky but should work on LAN.

  • WASD for movement
  • Left Click to shoot
  • Right Click to aim
  • Spacebar to jump
  • V to change view
  • Shift to sprint
  • Q to change weapons
  • R to reload
  • T for mouse

Future updates will include:

  • More maps
  • More characters
  • More interactive environments
  • More ways to earn points
  • Vehicles
  • More game modes

Updates will be released every 1-2 weeks

*Please note that this game is still very early in development. There are still lots of bugs, and a lot of gaps in content.  This is a huge project that I have been working on by myself for a very long time, and intend to keep working on for a very long time.  I have had some help from friends but haven't been able to compensate them. With your support I would like to continue working on this to get it to the stage it deserves to be. 

I have put this game out for free so that everyone can play, but if you would like to support the development of this game, or even influence it's design consider supporting us at https://www.patreon.com/IncursionStudio or donate directly through itch.io.

Share this game with your friends and have fun.
